title: Mm整个配置怎么没法加载？
txt_content:
本帖最后由 242121899 于 2020-6-20 14:12 编辑 

还是不行

夜叉:
  Type: IRON_GOLEM
  Display: '&b夜叉'
  Health: 5000
  Damage: 30
  Armor: 5000
  Faction: super_zombies
  Drops:
  - money 5000 0.9
  - 1 1 0.4
  KillMessages:
  - '&7[&b<target.name>&7]&6被&c<mob.name>&6砍死了'
  Options:
    Anger: true
    PreventRenaming: true
    PreventRandomEquipment: true
    PreventLeashing: true
  AIGoalSelectors:
    - 0 lookatplayers
    - 1 leapattarget
  AITargetSelectors:
    - 0 players
    - 1 attacker
  DamageModifiers:
    - ENTITY_ATTACK 0.2
  Equipment:
    - 夜叉镰:0
  BossBar:
    Enabled: true
    Title: 血量
    Range: 2
    Color: RED
    Style: SEGMENTED_10
    Title: '&c世界BOSS'&l<mob.name> &7 [&a&l血量：&d&l<mob.hp> /&b&l<mob.mhp> &7]&b&l目标：&f[&c&l<mob.tt.top>&f]'
  Skills:
  - potion{type=FIRE_RESISTANCE;duration=200;level=4} @Self ~onTimer:10
  - skill{s=夜叉出场} @self ~onSpawn
  - skill{s=夜榴弹} @PIR{r=30} =70%

  - equip{item=夜叉强化第一阶段防御:4} @self =40%
